alert.note: Alert for Trempealeau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 5:29PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Trempealeau County through 615 PM CDT... At 529 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Trempealeau, or 11 miles east of Winona, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Galesville around 535 PM CDT. Blair around 600 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Peacock Hill, Camp Decorah, Beach Corners, Perrot State Park, Frenchville, Thimble Park, Ettrick, Iduna, Hegg and Lock And Dam 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
